pkgmetadata.longdescription: Datetimes as Integers for Discrete-Event Simulations // Handles datetimes as integers for the usage inside Discrete-Event Simulations (DES). The conversion is made using the internally generic function as.numeric() of the base package. DES is described in Simulation Modeling and Analysis by Averill Law and David Kelton (1999) doi:10.2307/2288169.
